original_text: Behold, its blood was not brought into the inner part of the sanctuary. You certainly ought to have eaten it in the sanctuary, as I commanded.”
korean_text: 그 피는 성소에 들여오지 아니하는 것이었으니 그 제물은 너희가 내가 명령한 대로 거룩한 곳에서 먹었어야 했을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: its blood was not brought into the inner part of the sanctuary.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 피는 성소 안쪽으로 들여지지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: You certainly ought to have eaten it
